import React from "react"; import { useSelector, shallowEqual, connect } from "react-redux"; const Profile = ({ lastUpdate, light, form }) => { return (

Profile

{form.firstName}

{form.lastName}

{form.email}

{form.firstName + " " + form.lastName}

{form.email}

An artist of considerable range, Chet Faker — the name taken by Melbourne-raised, Brooklyn-based Nick Murphy — writes, performs and records all of his own music, giving it a warm, intimate feel with a solid groove structure.

); }; function mapStateToProps(state) { const { lastUpdate, light, form } = state; return { lastUpdate, light, form }; } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Profile);
